imdb.title: Touken Ranbu: Hanamaru
imdb.plot: The daily lives of warriors who work together to protect evil forces from changing history.

episodes.title: February - I Wish Tomorrow Will Be a Good Day, Too
episodes.plot: A new sword, Juzumaru Tsunetsugu, appears, and Kashuu is made to go along with his training in the mountains. Meanwhile, Honebami Toushirou gets left behind when he is dispatched and ends up in the wrong time period...

episodes.title: March - I Will Not Lose
episodes.plot: Mikazuki and Kogitsunemaru are relaxing and drinking tea when Gokotai's tigers pay a visit, and newly-arrived Taikogane Sadamune teams up with Shokudaikiri and Ookurikara in the sports festival planned by Tsurumaru.

episodes.title: April - Because You're Our Comrade in This Citadel
episodes.plot: Fudou Yukimitsu, who once belonged to Oda Nobunaga, can't seem to get along with those at the citadel... And then another new sword, Kogarasumaru, appears and joins their cherry blossom viewing party.

episodes.title: May - What I Can Do Because I'm Me
episodes.plot: Urashima wants his brothers Nagasone and Hachisuka to get along better, so he asks them to cook for him. Meanwhile, Yamanbagiri follows the newly-arrived Sohayanotsurugi to find out how he can be so cheerful even though he's a copy.

episodes.title: June - We're Counting on You from Now On, Too
episodes.plot: Sayo Samonji is having nightmares, so his brothers want to plant lavender to help him sleep. And with all the new Sword Warriors arriving, the citadel is getting crowded, so it's Hakata to the rescue with his buried treasure!

episodes.title: July - Now, It's Do-Or-Die
episodes.plot: New swords Monoyoshi Sadamune and Houchou Toushirou arrive. As Kashuu shows Monoyoshi around, lucky things happen one after another. Meanwhile, the Awataguchi brothers try to cheer Hakata up with a festival from his hometown.

episodes.title: August - So Let's Keep This a Secret, Okay?
episodes.plot: While Hasebe is away on an expedition, Kikkou Sadamune and Sengo Muramasa compete to see who will take care of Master in his place. Hirano finds Uguisumaru writing about Ookanehira and asks to learn more about the newcomer.

episodes.title: September - Sometimes It's Nice...
episodes.plot: Taroutachi, who is tall even for a Sword Warrior, has trouble with his size in his day-to-day life. In the midst of the hot summer, Mutsunokami comes up with a different kind of sparring to help everyone cool down.

episodes.title: October - See, It's Fine, Right?
episodes.plot: Houchou goes fishing with Urashima and the others after he arguing with Ichigo Hitofuri, but they end up falling asleep and wake up not knowing where they are... Oodenta is afraid his spiritual power is scaring away the animals.

episodes.title: November - I'm Counting on You
episodes.plot: With fall turning to winter, Shinano goes in search of warmth around the citadel. Meanwhile, the History Retrograde Army has been scheming in the Edo period, and Ookurikara leads a team to stop them.

episodes.title: December - Stories of Hanamaru Days
episodes.plot: Kashuu and the others try to find a way to save the Sword Warriors who are in trouble at Edo Castle...

episodes.title: January - Don't get cocky
episodes.plot: Yamatonokami Yasusada has manifested as the 17th member of the Sword Warriors in a "certain citadel". On his first morning he goes on a walk around the compound with Kashuu Kiyomitsu who shared the same former master, Okita Souji of the Shinsengumi.

episodes.title: February - There's nothing I want to say...
episodes.plot: Doudanuki Masakuni and Tsurumaru Kuninaga have manifested. Yamatonokami Yasusada and Kashuu Kiyomitsu show the two of them around the citadel.

episodes.title: March - It's one in ten thousand
episodes.plot: Hirano Toushirou has found a four-leaf clover underneath the big tree. He intends to give it to Uguisumaru, who has just arrived at the citadel, but while he is on his way he encounters a number of obstacles making his task not so easy.

episodes.title: April - What is Strength?
episodes.plot: Izuminokami Kanesada has manifested. Meanwhile, the ten thousand leaf cherry tree is in full bloom. The sword warriors enjoy viewing the cherry blossoms underneath the tree but trouble brews when Jiroutachi ends up drunk...

episodes.title: May - Kindness is Strength
episodes.plot: While the Sword Warriors are wrapped up in the joy of one of the Five Great Swords of Japan appearing, dispatch orders come down from Master.

episodes.title: June - This Citadel is joyous, isn't it?
episodes.plot: Yamatonokami Yasusada and Kashuu Kiyomitsu are preparing to go on an expedition in Edo. However, just before they leave their master falls ill. On their trip, the group heads into the mountains to collect medicinal herbs that can relieve a fever.

episodes.title: July - Caring for Someone
episodes.plot: Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki suggests that everyone heads to the beach. Along with new arrival, Urashima Kotetsu, the hopeful 17 Sword Warriors enjoy their first brush with the ocean.

episodes.title: August - The Formation of the Ghost Extermination Rangers!
episodes.plot: Tonbokiri and Nihongou arrive at the citadel and finally all three spears are together. A blue bird appears on the veranda and Nihongou is desperate to catch it for a certain reason. The three spears work together and chase after the blue bird.

episodes.title: September - That's the Kind of Past I Have
episodes.plot: Nakigitsune is enjoying cooking with Kogitsunemaru and Mikazuki Munechika. Meanwhile, dispatch orders come for Mount Atsukashi.

episodes.title: October - The Really Important Memories
episodes.plot: Aizen Kunitoshi and Hotaru can't help but be worried about making things work out in the citadel with Akashi Kuniyuki and his lackadaisical behavior. During all this, strange things keep happening around the citadel.

episodes.title: November - A Stern Blow to Okita's Inheritance
episodes.plot: Dispatch orders arrive for the Ikeda Inn, and Captain Yamatonokami Yasusada vows to annihilate the History Retrograde Army in order to avenge his previous loss there.

episodes.title: December - Our Citadel is the Hanamaru Today Too
episodes.plot: Yamatonokami Yasusada happens to encounter his former master, Okita Souji, on the first floor of the Ikeda Inn. Becoming a member of the Shinsengumi, he infiltrates the Ikeda Inn with Okita. Feeling uneasy, Kashuu Kiyomitsu goes after Yasusada...
